item.title: Frequently Asked Questions about the Match Quality Index (MQI)
item.description: Looking for the best WWE, AEW, Impact, TNA, ROH and more... matches to watch? Look no further than the Match Quality Index (MQI)! The MQI is a comprehensive metric that combines match rating and match length to provide a holistic assessment of the quality of each bout. By factoring in both subjective and objective measures, the MQI provides a more nuanced understanding of match quality, ensuring that you don't miss out on hidden gems or overhype over less-than-stellar performances.
